metadata.name: Australia
metadata.description:
Photographs of my hand-crafted world globes. 
The landmasses are created using the traditional technique of metal gilding. These examples are gilded in pure silver which is then given a patina effect.

I see these NFT's as a perfect mix of a traditional handmade object and a contemporary digital environment.

Custom-made NFT's featuring a country or region are available on request.
